logs.details: Today I started to block out the main level of my game. I did this by addeding basic walls and a floor and lighting with a dence fog.

image.alt: image of a road before fog
image.description: image of a road before fog

image.alt: image of a road after fog
image.description: image of a road after fog

logs.details:
Today I worked on the AI for my game.
It now locks onto the player and glows red when they detect the player.
I also added a new enemy type that shoots projectiles at the player.
